import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' const UserListScreen = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const { loading, error, users } = userList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch ]) const deleteHandler = (id) => { console.log('delete') } return ( <>
